alert.note: Alert for Inland Citrus; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 8:23PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Citrus and northwestern Sumter Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 823 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wildwood, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Inverness, Wildwood, Inverness Highlands South, Inverness Highlands North, Inverness Airport, Lake Panasoffkee, Gospel Island, Inverness Highlands, Rutland, Wahoo, Withlapopka Isle and Floral City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
